column1: '''The Hunt for the Ring''' is a chapter in ''[[Unfinished Tales]]'', a posthumously published work of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]]. The chapter is a partly published version of a manuscript now held at the [[Marquette University]] (MSS 4/2/31-37; other parts of this manuscript have been included in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'', see pp. 145, 251-2).<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]] (HarperCollins''Publishers'' 2008), ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'', p. 251</ref><ref>[http://www.marquette.edu/library/archives/Mss/JRRT/JRRT-seriesa4.shtml ''The Lord of the Rings'': Additional Manuscripts Presented by Christopher Tolkien, Fourth Installment (MSS-4)], accessed 21 October 2010</ref>
